title: LOW FPS from latest patch
body: The FPS in full screen mode during game is awful it is unplayable. It has been messed up since patch 7.3 for me and I am not enjoying this. Its not my computer not my settings or my power cord I have tried Riots troubleshooting FPS it has done nothing! I have always had 160-270 FPS and since the patch 20-75 FPS is all i get. If i go into game and change my setting to windowed I get my normal FPS back but windowed mode sucks and is tiny so CAN YOU PLEASE TELL ME YOU ARE WORKING ON A SOLUTION?! I have seen multiple people with the same problem so I know its not just me! Thank you!!!

replies.body: There might be outdated drivers that can cause frame rate issues like that.  If you've already gone through the guide then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to your ticket for context. We'll reply back as soon as we can!
